description:
Responsibilities

  • Monitor and analyze security events and incidents.
  • Implement and manage security tools such as firewalls and encryption programs.
  • Conduct regular security assessments and vulnerability testing.
  • Develop and update security policies and procedures.
  • Respond to and mitigate cybersecurity incidents.

Qualifications

  • Bachelor’s degree in Cybersecurity, Information Technology, or a related field.
  • Experience as a Cybersecurity Analyst or similar role.
  • Knowledge of security frameworks and best practices.
  • Proficiency with security tools and technologies.
  • Strong analytical and investigative skills.
  • Ability to work independently and under pressure.
